review.content: There are still new and will see how they continue to work for him. So far, so good!
Perfect for our little Layn. Need more styles and colors
No complaints
Fantastic!
We love these shirts!
Amazing product! Perfect for my boy who needs sensory compression to help support him throughout the day.
I bought the child’s current size and they were too large to provide compression The quality seems good, but I don’t know yet if they work for her
Haven’t received it yet
These are great! Super well made!! My son loves throwing them up in the air to catch them. They are terrific for working on hand-eye coordination. He loves them!!
Great product. Don’t know how many I can afford. Just a little steep.
Amazing products and customer service!
Fast shipping, packaged well, great material, sizing was spot on. We will be back to buy more!
Great fit and so soft!
Great company and great outfits. You were recommended to us by our PT. Thank you for what you do!
The blankets were good but the clothes run small
Excellent! They help so much!
My Granddaughter loves them!
I wish the size 5-9 would come back in stock. I ordered these for my daughter but she needs bigger 1s. This is the only sock I can get her to wear and I’ve bought over 15 pair.
i haven't received my order yet.
Had tags and seams. Didn’t think it was suppose to have either
It’s for my grandson

Sadly the material was unlike other compression shirts we’ve bought. Your material feels more like a swim shirt vs soft. And there was a tag on the inside of the shirt by the waistline/hip area. Sensory issues and the need for a compression shirt are related so I was really surprised about the feel of the shirt and the tag. We had to immediately rip out the tag and daughter couldn’t handle the material of the shirt. We had high hopes for your company because the price was two times as much than we’ve paid for a soft and cozy compression shirt. We decided to try your company because you offer a range of colors. But we’re unable to use the shirt as the feel is not good.
My daughter loves these pants! It’s really amazing how one piece of clothing can change their whole attitude on getting dressed!
Excellent quality. Fit is perfect.

Ordered 2, both were same size but pink was bigger than black (have photos lying on top each other). For this price , was expecting much more compression like much cheaper ones we are using but that did not come in anything but white. Stitching is nice and looks well done but we cannot use these for "hugging".

We ordered the clothing for my 2-year-old autistic daughter. Soon as the clothing came in I put them on her right away to see how she would react. I had to force the clothes off of her to wash them because she didn't want to take them off thank you Kozie!!!!
My son loves his Kozie clothes! Thank you for an amazing product.
My son really likes these shirts and it seems to help with his behavior
My son loves it! He said it's like wearing a hug. It came in super cute packaging.
Great fit and does the job
Great quality and the morning battle for putting pants on has ended!! My daughter loves them!!
Two large for our 3 1/2 year old
love the quality!
My son loves them! And they stretch to grow well with him.
Son loves them and is asking to wear them daily.
We were looking for something with the feel of putty, without the mess and distraction. My daughter loves this as a substitute.
Life saver!
We love them for my daughter...she asked for more as she identified that they help her
I love the product!! My grandson was able to keep the clothes on for an hour!! Which is a lot longer then all we have came across. We are continuing to work with him on extending that amount of time.

My son was having a lot of sensory issues with any and all shorts and pants. I decided to try these out, and was surprised to find he loves them! I ended up buying more. Cute colors, and good quality as well. Highly recommended for anyone with sensory struggles.
Very good, we use the product for my daughter who has burn scars.

My son usually sweats and sleeps hot even with A/C and a fan. He absolutely loves his new temperature control t-shirt and will wear nothing else to bed. I hope you continue to make these as he ages out of the medium and large sizes.
My son loves his compression shirts
This item fits perfectly and has outstanding quality!

Amazing product, sturdy enough for active children. My kids roll around in the mud and their kozie shirts and shorts are so easy to clean! My son calls them his "sqeezey shirts" and wears at least one kozie product every day. Not to mention the amazing customer service Kozie sellers offers! Thanks so much Kozie!!

Pricey. Order 2 sizes smaller than sizing chart to get a good fit and compression. I appreciate 3 feminine colors, and the fact that the undershirt won’t show under school shirts or dresses for my daughter.
It is my son’s favorite outfit.
My son will wear this and I think it helps at school. It's well-made and he likes the color. We turn it inside out otherwise he doesn't like the feel of the seams.
my experience has been good.
They are awesome!
If you have a sensory child these are for you!!
If you have a sensory child these are for you!!
They are awesome
Love these but they do run big
Love these but they do run big
This product is wonderful, thank you so much.
This shirt is perfect!

I purchased these items for our granddaughter at the recommendation of her therapist. We are pleased with the purchase and are looking forward to how she responds to compression clothing. She tends to want to strip down when she is in regular attire…and so far, she has kept these items on. PLUS…your,Susan Donohoe in Customer Service was SO helpful and responded so quickly when I realized I made an entry error upon submitting my initial order. A HUGE shout-out to her. Thank you!!!
My son loves them, they gave us a coupon due to a rip in a previous shirts seam.
The pants were not soft material and had uncomfortable seams. The price was very high for the quality. Also, you have to pay to send back an item. I would not recommend buying from this retailer
The pants were not soft material and had uncomfortable seams. The price was very high for the quality. Also, you have to pay to send back an item. I would not recommend buying from this retailer
My son loves this shirt! He’s able to wear it with just about anything. It creates that snug feeling he likes without being too hot. It’s great for summertime fun!
He wears them.
The absolute best! Our son has tried many brands and this is a winner! He specifically requests his shirts! Wonderful customer service as well!
My son seams to be more focus when he is wearing the shirt
Great fit! So far, it’s doing a great job!! Only have trialed on one child so far as a therapist stand point! Great material, love that there are not any tags or irritating aspects to it!
He went from sleeping 3 hours at night to 6 hours
Grandson continues to enjoy theses comfy clothes! Thanks
Grandson continues to enjoy theses comfy clothes! Thanks

My son would not take the compression shirt off the first day. He wanted to sleep in it and it took a lot of tries to get him to take it off so I could wash it. He then immediately wanted it back on. I usually cannot get him to want or even tolerate many clothes, so this is a huge win for us. I will be ordering another when I can. Thank you!
My son loves his shirts, he calls them his hug shirts

My daughter loves Kozie Clothes! Someone gifted us a set and my daughter wanted to wear them everyday. I purchased her some of the pants short sleeve shirts and long sleeve shirts. She loves them all. She wears the pants under her dresses and the shirts under her dresses and even loves wearing them without other clothes on top. I am so happy she loves them and gets that “hug” feeling she’s always seeking!
My son loves it! It’s of high quality and shopping was fast and customer service was good. Thank you!
An everyday must for our sensory girl!
My grandson loves them! He wants to sleep in the long sleeve shirt!

I like these shirts but the sizing isn’t correct. I’ve bought a 4T and 5T and both are too big. My child wears a 5T normally in non compression shirts. I will try a 3T next. I like the fabric because they are less hot than the ones on amazon but I think the sizing needs to be altered

I like these shirts but the sizing isn’t correct. I’ve bought a 4T and 5T and both are too big. My child wears a 5T normally in non compression shirts. I will try a 3T next. I like the fabric because they are less hot than the ones on amazon but I think the sizing needs to be altered

I like these shirts but the sizing isn’t correct. I’ve bought a 4T and 5T and both are too big. My child wears a 5T normally in non compression shirts. I will try a 3T next. I like the fabric because they are less hot than the ones on amazon but I think the sizing needs to be altered
Love love love! My 4 year old Grandson has a tough time with clothes but he will wear and keep on his Kozie clothes! So thankful
The sizing was off. The shirts are way too big :(
really great will purchase every size over time
A very nice product! We will be ordering more!
We've been using your product for a few years. Your shirts bring a comfortable hug for my sensory seeking son. This is a great product.
My grandson loved the compression shirts
Love the products. Need more colors
These are so soft. My daughter has been wearing a compression shirt for about six months these are the softest and by far the most comfortable they also look just like a normal shirt
An essential item for our sensory girl!
My son has sensory needs and likes the shirt. I just wish it wasn’t so expensive. It is also pilling after a few wears.
The compression T-Shirts are an absolute necessity for my granddaughters with SPD. Thank you for making them. It is hard to find anything they can wear!!! LOVE. LOVE. LOVE!!
Awesome compression compression shirts (my son’s favorite) and awesome service!
My kiddo loves it!
Muy práctico
Muy inútiles
My daughter has two of these and loves to wear them under her shirts. She likes the length and compression level but they do cause her to get too hot on warm days. They don't seem very breathable.
It was great!!
Very picky customer was very happy with the fit, the feel and the colors! Will be ordering more

I was very disappointed in the shirt because it had a label sewed into the inside seam!! After all of the talk about sensory difficult in children, I certainly would have thought that the product would be sensitive to this!!
We love it, it has worked so well with our son! The other perk, is that it is super easy to clean and to put back together!
Very high quality shirt, highly recommend
They are awesome
They are awesome
I ordered them to big so they aren't working yet however I have ordered from you before and everything was perfect
Shipping is fast and a great product for my sensory seeking 3 year old.
Lots of options. Excited to try
Great as always! Love Kozie!!
Love the variety of colors!
It was just fine
Excellent as as always! Thank you!
easy website
looks like nice products
Easy to order, free shipping!!
Great size and color selection
Excellent
I was looking for sensory socks for a 3 year old little boy. Thank you for making these socks. God bless you!
Great!
Easy and fast
Great
It was very easy.
organized and description had what i needed
It was a stress-free shopping experience
Website was flipping around. Difficult to navigate
Prices that it initially listed changed as I tried to order. Seemed weird. I get it starts at but why the change in a couple dollars no matter which color I pick?
Great product and website. Thanks!
Easy and informative site!
Good options!
Easy!
great and ea sy
Easy shopping experience wish the prices were a little cheaper though
Very easy ro place order.
Easy to use and quick.
Website wasn’t working for placing orders
Site was simple to use. Very easy checkout process.
Easy to shop. Clear size chart.
Easy site
Kozie has the best compression shirts. I have been buying them for my son for the past seven years!
My son absolutely loves his Kozie shirts! He has worn them for years. Best quality around.
Love that you offer smaller sizes for compression wear! Using for my EI population!
Very easy to use the website. You offer larger sizes that are hard to find.
Easy site to search looking forward to testing the products
Love this company!
New to this clothing, anxious to give it a try.
Easy to order the things we need
Easy to order my items
I like this product and buying it is smooth but it is really expensive.
Very easy to order
Wish you provided free shipping, especialy since the price of the item was so high.
Very quick and simple layout to find what I needed. Thank you.
my son loves the compression shirt
First time trying your clothes, have a SPD toddler, hope he’ll enjoy. Thank you.
Super easy to navigate and exciting to see they have clothing in my toddlers size!!! Thank you.
Super easy to navigate and exciting to see they have clothing in my toddlers size!!! Thank you.
Nice clothes. My daughter enjoys wearing them to daycare.
Your website could load faster. I’m grateful for my purchase.
Always the best products and so usefully for our grandkids with SPD!
great!
I love the quality of the fabric!! My kiddo loves it too. ❤️❤️❤️
LOVE YOUR COMPANY. I'M A PRESCHOOL SPECIAL EDUCATION TEACHER AND RECOMMEND YOUR COMPANY TO MANY PARENTS FOR THEIR CHILDREN. THANK YOU!
Shirts work out great!
Always great products and the good science to it!
great, very fast
Easy to navigate your website. So excited to see if this helps my granddaughter!
Great! Just wish I didn’t have to pay for shipping.
Like this site great options
Great site
Easy check out.
Good selection, easy to make purchase
NICe and easy
It always nice to be able to find what one is looking for. Thank you
easy!
great
These compression shirts are the best! I’ve been buying them for my son with sensory issues for years because, by far, the are the most comfortable.
Easy ordering process. thank you.
Website would not let me log into my account
New website looks great. Works well.

The quality of this shirt is good and it arrived quickly. However, I have one suggestion. Please don’t put a tag on the inside of a shirt made for kids with sensory challenges. Include wash instructions in the package! Having to cut out that tag left a little of it behind in the seam, which was still bothersome to my son. That is my reason for 4/5; otherwise it’s a great compression shirt.

Reversible Short Sleeve - Therapeutic for Deep Calming Pressure Complete game changer. My four-year-old has always had issues with clothing, he seems to be hyper-sensitive to different fabrics, seams, and necklines. Getting him dressed each day was more than a battle—I found myself crying at the pediatrician more than once over the struggle to get him dressed. We had seen Kozie clothes before but were hesitant to purchase something at a higher price point assuming he would refuse to wear it, and we also doubted if a shirt could really make that big a difference.. After literal years of battling over clothes, we decided to make the purchase, and my only regret is not ordering it sooner. We've had the double-sided compression shirt for a week and it has made a complete turn-around in my son. Getting dressed isn't a struggle anymore, he absolutely loves his compression shirt and thanks me for it multiple times a day. He is a little small for his age and the 4T fits perfectly.
These shirts are a great quality but I wish they were seamless. My spd daughter benefits from the compression but has to wear it inside out due to the seams.
Everything was great
Everything was great
Very well made! Love this shirt. Just bought 4 more

Our son has autism and sensory issues and needs quite a bit of compression to help him regulate. This shirt was perfect for that! It looks stylish and like a regular shirt, but provides necessary compression. The only thing I’ll caution is that it stains pretty easily. We got the light gray and it was stained the first time he wore it. So maybe buy black...? Great buy. He wears a 5T in regular shirts and the 6 was a perfect, snug fit.
The perfect compression shirts for our son with CP. His OT recommended tighter-fitting compression shirts to make him feel secure and supported, and these are great.
My son has had 100% successful days at school, each time he has worn this. This fit wasn't as tight as the same size of short sleeve in the compression shirt. We are ordering more
My son has had 100% successful days at school, each time he has worn this. This fit wasn't as tight as the same size of short sleeve in the compression shirt. We are ordering more
I purchased three different outfits .The quality was amazing. So nice to have a company who provides adaptive clothing for babies. I highly recommend Kozie

We love my son's new Nathan onesie! We'll definitely be ordering more. It runs small--he wears a 3T but we ordered a 4 and I'm glad we did. I think it could definitely use one more snap on the crotch (we'll be adding one) but all in all we're thrilled to find a onesie in this size that has snaps for diapering and easy access for a gtube. It's soft and definitely seemed comfy.
Ships IMMEDIATELY!! Excellent quality. Highly recommended

The shirt arrived in four days which is pretty good. It appears to be well made and durable with a nice thick material and quality stitching. Held up fine through initial wash then went straight on baby. He seems quite comfortable in it, sleeping.

My mom bought my daughter a monster, the blue one, and she loves it! I keep it in her crib and she looks at it and now she's been hugging it! My daughter has a genetic mutation that causes seizures and at high risk for autism. Even though we haven't seen autistic tendencies, she still loves this monster. I think a typically developing child would love this monster too!

We have been using this shirt for a couple of weeks and have seen great results. My 2 year old has SPD and with the shirt he is much more calm and focused while playing. It offers him great sensory input.
Pants run true to size and appear to be quality made. Hoping these help with my former 27wk preemie and proprioceptive input.
clothes wear and wash fine and also comfortable

Our school district ordered this product (as well as shirt sleeved version)for a student who falls under ASD. Both teachers and parents saw immediate progress with his ability to transition and tolerate changes in routine [spring field trips]. We encountered a small issue, which was quickly taken care of by Susan. We will be using your company again-thank you, Kozie Clothes!!
cloths help with my grandsons sensory problem
Works great for my son with hyperextension/mobility issues! Bought one size smaller since they run a smidge large. And Susan is a peach to communicate with!

We love our weighted blanket. It was made to our specific needs about five years ago and is as beautiful today as it was when we received it. We like the fact that the pellets are not recycled from something that might be dangerous and that there were many fabrics to choose from. Highly recommended
Hi my son is 16 and am looking for one for a large adult size, can you advise please ? Thanks

We use this blanket for our non-verbal, adult daughter who suffered a TBI. When she becomes agitated or tense, we use this blanket to help soothe her. The blanket allows the agitation and extreme muscle tension to slowly melt away so that she can relax. I sometimes steal it away to use myself when she doesn't need it!
Seems the perfect shirt for my son who sweats and overheats which leads to him itching and scratching.

My 6 year old daughter LOVES this blanket! She sleeps so peacefully underneath it, and helps to calm her when she is upset. We call it "relaxing blankie", it is a miracle worker! My 3 year old neurotypical daughter runs to fetch it when her older sister is upset, even she recognizes how useful it is! The 3 year old wants to know when she's getting one. I had to try it out for myself, and think it is pretty soothing. The only thing I would suggest is a family pack!

My daughter LOVES this blanket! It helps her to relax when she is overstimulated. I work nights intermittently, and have tried this blanket myself when I am having trouble winding down from working in the ER, and it works for me too!

My daughter LOVES this blanket! It helps her to relax when she is overstimulated. I work nights intermittently, and have tried this blanket myself when I am having trouble winding down from working in the ER, and it works for me too!

It fits perfectly!!! He still has room to stretch and not be TOO confined! We used it today for the first time when he started to really panic! YAY!!!! He loved it and calmed down much quicker than he would have without it!!! I'm attaching a pic!

Having fibromyalgia and restless nights it was suggested I try this weighted blanket. WOW! It's remarkable that I have had nothing but peaceful, calm, and full nights sleep since the very first night. I find myself smiling. Would never give it up!! It's true what they say, it enhances calmness!

It fits perfectly!!! He still has room to stretch and not be TOO confined! We used it today for the first time when he started to really panic! YAY!!!! He loved it and calmed down much quicker than he would have without it!!!

This weighted blanket is so soft and comforting on the one side and “cool” on the skin on the other. We use it daily in our family (parents as much as the kids we bought it for!) It is the perfect size to keep on the couch for easy access while watching TV, reading or napping. Using this blanket before bedtime helps to create a “calm down” session for our son.
-Special Education Teacher (West Chester)

Wow! How exciting that there is actually a product addressing the needs of my child and the family. Your clothes are so adorable any parent or child would love them! These clothes have opened doors for us. We now make more social appearances with less frustration.

This blanket saved my sanity! My son is 1 year old. Until a month ago he was up at least 3-4 times a night. I had tried all kinds of things to get him to sleep through the night, or at least more than 2 hours at a time. I was at my wits end. So I put him to bed with this blanket on, and for the first time in his life he slept 8 1/2 hours straight! He has done so everynight since! This blanket is amazing. I can lay him down in his crib with it on his legs, and he quietly plays with the soft velvety fabric till he falls asleep. It is so well made and I love that it is machine washable!

I love this for my son. He has a gtube on his left side and also a peritoneal dialysis catheter on his right side. He does not have head control, so dressing him in something that does not need to be slid over his head is super nice. With the buttons down the front, his catheters can dangle out through the openings between buttons instead of being pressed against his skin and coming out of a leg hole. The material is very soft and stretchy, which I love. Highly recommend!! We have the blue suit, it is richer in color than pictured here, more like a royal blue. It looks great!
I love how convenient this is for my baby's G tube. I had a question about my order, and they had the best customer service by being kind and prompt.

I have not purchased this item bc I must say, the color and look of horse is not your average ‘girl’ horse and that the pieces detach means they will either be in my daughters mouth or lost and she will get upset. Perhaps a design that can open and close, like a flap with Velcro, seamed and attached on one side, could serve this purpose better?
This was great at first, but after a few washes the seems started to come apart in several spots and it is no longer snug enough to do much.
Awesome.
Love this product
